title: what is bloody HECK IS GOIGN ON HERE!!!!!!!
body: well here i am sitting there playing some good ole'{{champion:119}} and outta no where my game jut freezes minions stop auto'n and everything the recconect thign comes up and im just sitting there on 70 ms, with no clue of what is going on. so for about 20 minutes im sitting there tryign to figure out if i can recconect to the game and my friend says the game is over, im sitting their like what? your full of it right man? he says nah mayte games over. now i just did a ping test, on a server in sydney, and it says i should be on 70 ms. NOW WHY AN I DEALING WITH THIS BS. I KNOW THE FIRST PROBLEM WOULD BE MY CRAP INTERNET BUT ITS FINE, i can play 4K vids and stuff to easy, yet my connection to the league server is dong asf. please fix the servers connected to ranked.

replies.body: That also happened to me earlier. It was bizarre, I still had good ping and I could everyone else move. I quit the client and then reconnected, that solved the issue.
next time that happens leave the game and reconnect also check here as it might be a server problem they do happen http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_AU#oce
